BCGLBBLPHAC: Information is an adventurer's most important asset, so get familiar with and investigate Fontaine's wildlife! Perhaps it will be of benefit in your future adventures...
In combat, one must take into account the environment. Take advantage of the terrain to defeat your opponents as easily as a flower floats down the current!
Information is an adventurer's most important asset, so get familiar with and investigate Fontaine's wildlife! Perhaps it will be of benefit in your future adventures...
Battle is the tempo of adventure. Be familiar with the characteristics of opponents, know their weaknesses, and advance towards victory, step by step!
In chaotic battle, everchanging variation is the only constant. Use the appropriate strategy to erase their advantage, and victory will be within your grasp!
The Emperor of Fire and Iron's attacks are brutal, but trail off quickly. Seize your chance and attack when the timing is right to shatter the enemy's thick armor!
